citations.narrative:
The goat feed was being stored in a container without a lid. This could allow the food to become contaminated or allow
vermin access. Food must be stored in a manner which adequately protects against deterioration, molding or
contamination by vermin. The facility corrected the issue by switching the food storage container with one which had a
tight fitting lid.
*********Corrected on July 7, 2025 at the time of inspection
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.125(c) 
   
Facilities, general. 
The goat feed was being stored in a container without a lid. This could allow the food to become contaminated or allow 
vermin access. Food must be stored in a manner which adequately protects against deterioration, molding or 
contamination by vermin. The facility corrected the issue by switching the food storage container with one which had a 
tight fitting lid.  
*********Corrected on July 7, 2025 at the time of inspection 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
 n

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
